bevm-canary.name: OmniBTC
bevm-canary.description: The first decentralized omnichain financial platform.

bevm-canary.name: SoulBound
bevm-canary.description: The first community centric, incentive-based Launchpad 2.0 focused on Bitcoin Ecosyetm A new paradigm for investment in Web3.

bevm-canary.name: Dsyncle
bevm-canary.description: Dsyncle is a transaction-driven Web3 instant messaging tool built based on Nostr/Tradivi(Cake)/Sketch protocols.

bevm-canary.name: Meson
bevm-canary.description: Meson (https://meson.fi) is a leading unified cross-chain bridging protocol that enables the seamless cross-chain experience for tokens like BTC, ETH, BNB, USDC, USDT, and DAI across more than 33 high-performance public chains and layer-2 solutions.

bevm-canary.name: Owlto Finance
bevm-canary.description: Owlto Finance is a decentralized cross-rollup bridge that focuses on L2, providing 'safe, fast, cheap, and easy-to-use' services.

bevm-canary.name: Coral Finance
bevm-canary.description: Coral Finance is a derivatives trading platform on Bitcoin Layer2. We Premium Trading that provide a reliable and non-inflationary solution for a variety of assets, such as cryptos, inscriptions and stocks of RWA. In addition, it holds core values for users such as asset growth, risk management, and capital efficiency.

bevm-canary.name: Bevscriptions
bevm-canary.description: The first inscription platform on BTC L2 - BEVM.

bevm-canary.name: BL2Rune
bevm-canary.description: BL2Rune is a Rune launch platform built on BEVM , utilizing the virtual machine and decentralized application layer of BEVM to establish new Rune standards.

bevm-canary.name: Richverse
bevm-canary.description: Start from BRC Gamefi to Socialfi Network.

bevm-canary.name: Satoshi Protocol
bevm-canary.description: The Satoshi Protocol is a fully decentralized BTC over-collateralized stablecoin built on BEVM. Any user can mint stablecoins by collateralizing BTC. In the future, the Satoshi Protocol will also integrate its stablecoin into the Lightning Network, allowing its BTC stablecoin to be truly used in the real world.

bevm-canary.name: Polyhedra
bevm-canary.description: Polyhedra is a Web3 cross-operation infrastructure featuring ZKBridge, currently the largest ZKBridge ecosystem, supporting 35+ mainstream L1 and L2 cross-chain interoperability. It also supports both FT and NFT cross-chains at present.

bevm-canary.name: DIA
bevm-canary.description: DIA is a well-known oracle protocol, currently supporting 40+ mainstream L1 and L2 blockchains, continuously providing price feeds for 3000+ tokens and 18000+ NFTs. DIA will connect to BEVM, providing oracle quotation services for BEVM ecosystem projects.

bevm-canary.name: Thirdweb
bevm-canary.description: Thirdweb is a Web3 development platform that provides pre-built smart contracts to create products, allowing developers to build products quickly and efficiently. Currently, Thirdweb is almost compatible with all mainstream smart contract platforms including BEVM.

bevm-canary.name: ParticleNtwrk
bevm-canary.description: ParticleNtwrk is currently the world's largest AA wallet, supporting 30+ mainstream chains. ParticleNtwrk is currently integrating BEVM, allowing users to experience the convenience of AA smart contract wallets on BTCL2.
